2 days ago - The Davis Sewing Machine company made their first Dayton bicycle, in Dayton, Ohio, in 1892. In 1924, George's son, Horace M. Huffman Sr., founded the Huffman Manufacturing Company. From then until 1949, Huffman continued to manufacture and sell bicycles under the "Dayton" brand.

A leader in the bike industry for over 130 years, Huffy bicycles continues to reign the world as one of the best and most-beloved bike brands. Huffy offers nearly every size and style of bike, from mellow beach cruisers to tough BMX cycles, so you can be sure to pick the one that fits you best.
